```{r}
win_prop <- function(N){
  i <-rep(0,N)
  i <- as.vector(i)
  for (x in 1:N) {
    #record the result of one single round#
    k <- c(0,0,0,0)
    for (y in 1:4) {
     a <- sample(1:6,1,replace = TRUE)
      if(a == 6){
    k[y] = 1
  }
    }
    if(sum(k)>=1){
      i[x]=1
    }
  }
  #calculate the proportion of times I win the bet#
  return(sum(i)/N)
}
win_prop(1000)
win_prop(10000)
```



##2
```{r}
min_index <- function(x){
  n <- length(x)
  flag = 1
  a = x[1]
  for (i in 2:n) {
   if(x[i]<a){
     a = x[i]
     flag = i
   } 
  }
  return(paste('The smallest element is',a,'and the index is',flag))
}

v <- c(1,4,2,0,5)
min_index(v)

v2 <- c(5,4,3,2,1)
min_index(v2)

v3 <- c(-1,1,2,3,4)
min_index(v3)
```
